name: Peter Peecha's Yummy Time 4
description:
The best Peter Peecha's Yummy Time yet!

Play the role of Peter Peecha in this re-telling of Peter work at Freddy movie 3!

Controls:

Move character/cursor - Arrow keys / WASD

Interact/Confirm - Space / Z / Enter

Cancel/Party - X

Fast Forward (x3) - F

Fast Forward (x10) - G

Play on Newgrounds

Gamejolt Page
